entry.title: SSH Term Pro
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$30.00 â†’ å…è²» (å…è²» ~ $30.00)ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

ã€Privacy Security Â· Ad-Free Â· No Subscriptions Â· Pure SSH Clientã€‘ Efficiently manage Linux SSH servers via Mac, iPhone, and iPad. Features Terminal, SFTP, SCP, online editing, and real-time monitoring of CPU, memory, and disk usage. All connection details (server names, passwords, images) are stored exclusively on end-user devices. The app does not collect or share personal or network data in any form.
